title: nallatanamAi solli tirutta vENum
sahitya:
nallatanamAi sollit-tirutta vENum nAngaL vandu shollAdirukka nI un piLLaiyai


anupallavi

  mella engaL manai vandu shuvarEri veNNait-tayir pAluDan kaLavADi
vallan endan piLLaiyODu uravADi nAngaL vandu shollAdirukka un piLLaiyai


caraNam    pAlukkum kAval anda pUnaikkum tOzhan engaL paiyanukkum kaNNanukkum nEyam 
mElukku shollum vArttai iduvallavE yashOdE vENumenrAl vandu pAr inda nyAyam 
muzham kAlukkum talaikkum oru kaTTum uNDO pashum kanrinaiyE uriyErit-tEDum nyAyam 
Alukkum aravapaDa mElukkum vandu ninru kaNNan vandu sheivadellAm ellAmE mAyam
